footnotes: Nawe watazame, na uangalie vyema adhabu gani na mateso yatakayo wapata kwa kwenda kinyume nawe na kukukadhibisha. Basi watakuja ona kwa macho yao zitakavyo shindwa safu zao, na wataona nusura ya Mwenyezi Mungu inavyo wafikia Waumini.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
